attributes.description:
Volvo XC60 with D5 engine. Vehicle comes with a full service history and spare keys. just had a timing belt replacement so nothing to spend. The ideal family vehicle with all volvo safety.  Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.

attributes.description: BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Barend Conradie As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. attributes.description: We at KIA RANDBURG pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.description:
KIA RIO 1.4 MT LX PE
Stunning Rio LX in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Rear sensors to assist with parking. Manual transmission and gives a smooth and comfortable drive. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
At Kia Northcliff, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.    

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Northcliff Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.    

 Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you, or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle.  

 Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-in's accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.
